effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. If the user was not yet hit by an opponent’s physical move this turn, this move will fail.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. If the user was not yet hit by an opponent’s physical move this turn, this move will fail.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. If the user was not yet hit by an opponent’s physical move this turn, this move will fail.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Only inflicts damage if the user was hit by a physical move this turn.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Only inflicts damage if the user was hit by a physical move this turn.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Only inflicts damage if the user was hit by a physical move this turn.
